SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INV_MAS A, TB_PO B, TB_USER D, TB_DEPT E WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.inv_no = B.inv_no AND D.use_yn = 'Y' AND D.dept_cd = E.dept_cd

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_INV_MAS(INV_NO, INV_TTL, INV_QTY, INV_AMT, ACTG_YEAR, INV_DT, INV_REQR, REG_DT, REGR) VALUES (#{invNo}, #{invTtl}, CAST(#{invQty} as int), CAST(#{invAmt} as int), #{actgYear}, #{invDt}, #{regr}, now(), #{regr}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE INV_DT = #{invDt}, INV_QTY = CAST(#{invQty} as int), INV_AMT = CAST(#{invAmt} as int), INV_REQR = #{regr}, INV_TTL = #{invTtl}, UPDR = #{updr}, UP_DT = now()

INSERT INTO TB_PO(PO_NO, INV_NO, PO_CHRGR, MFGD_NM, QTY, PO_AMT, REGR) VALUES (#{poNo}, #{invNo}, #{regr}, #{mfgdNm}, CAST(#{qty} as int), CAST(#{poAmt} as int), #{regr}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PO_CHRGR = #{regr}, MFGD_NM = #{mfgdNm}, QTY = CAST(#{qty} as int), PO_AMT = CAST(#{poAmt} as int), UPDR = #{regr}, UP_DT = now()
